summary:
**Key Material Information (Dividend Announcement & Financial Results):**  

- **Record fully franked final dividend:** 20.0cps (+11.1% YoY), full-year dividend 37.0cps (all-time high).  
- **Profit:** $259.8M (up from $253.0M in 2024), EPS 34.1cps (33.3cps prior).  
- **LIC capital gain component:** 7.0cps (tax-deductible for shareholders).  
- **Portfolio activity:**  
  - Purchases: Major additions include BHP, NAB, Origin, Xero (new).  
  - Sales: Exited CBA ($48M), Aristocrat, Macquarie; portfolio reduced to 85 holdings.  
- **Performance:** NTA +13.3% (S&P/ASX 200 Accumulation Index +13.8%).  
- **Outlook:** Focus on sustaining dividends amid market risks; highlights defensive portfolio positioning.  

**Omitted:** Non-material details (historical context, management commentary, contact info).
